document_data.name: Temple of Bane
document_data.mainbody: The '''Temple of Bane''' in [[Snowmantle]] was constructed by the [[Zhentarim]] shortly before the year [[1369 DR]], for the [[Bane]]-faithful [[Zhentilar]]soldiers that were occupying the small village. It also served as a living quarters for the occupying forces, as they oversaw the lumber efforts within the nearby slave camp.
document_data.Description:
The Head Priestess of the temple was the cruel and ambitious [[Vigilant Talon]] of Bane, [[Glorganna]], who was served by seven subordinate [[priest]]s. She kept a small cache of treasure, along with vials of her [[poison]]-of-choice along with a ''[[Book of Vile Darkness]]'' hidden within the temple's altar.

The temple was corrupted with evil [[magic]] that had a maximizing [[metamagic]] effect upon any [[spell]]s cast by worshipers of [[Bane]].
